member.name: SYNCMGR_HANDLER_TYPE
member.summary: Specifies the type of a handler. Used by .

member.name: SYNCMGR_HANDLER_TYPE.SYNCMGR_HT_UNSPECIFIED
member.summary: The handler type is unknown. This value is also used if fails.

member.name: SYNCMGR_HANDLER_TYPE.SYNCMGR_HT_DEVICE
member.summary: The handler syncs with a device such as a phone or PDA.

member.name: SYNCMGR_HANDLER_TYPE.SYNCMGR_HT_FOLDER
member.summary: The handler syncs with local or remote folders.

member.name: SYNCMGR_HANDLER_TYPE.SYNCMGR_HT_SERVICE
member.summary: The handler syncs with a web service.

member.name: SYNCMGR_HANDLER_TYPE.SYNCMGR_HT_COMPUTER
member.summary: The handler syncs with a computer.
